attributes.action: call for a National Investigation into the NHS TRUSTS COMPLAINTS PROCESS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned,are shocked by the attitude of The NHS TRUST to complaints...

"As many people have found out the NHS COMPLAINTS SYSTEM is designed to protect members of staff rather than apologies or justice to justifiably aggrieved patients"
(Prof Vernon Coleman)

In consequence of the BIASED scandalous way in which complaints are handled for a lot of people there is no accountability.

I humbly submit this petition on behalf of those who's Human Rights have been Neglected,Violated & Abused.In line with Article 13 -The Right to an effective remedy (ECHR)

Thank you Sir

Nadia Von Feldmeier

Human Rights Campaigner

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual NHS Trusts
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
